column4: how do you know what inf file you need to supply ndiswrapper?
lspci says my wireless card is a broadcom
but it doesn't specify which one
Network controller: Broadcom Corporation: Unknown device 4318
oh! i didn't think to try the cd
but i currently don't have the right broadcom inf file either :)
or do you have to do something else too
it's not ready i just upgraded one box today, and it doesn't seem ready for production yet
my ati chipset is better supported in that kernel
no, you'd have to roll your own
